localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.
nodes.title: Fugue 3.0 - Fresh music to make your videos a blast
nodes.author: Ivan Braun

nodes.excerpt: If you're an Apple Music user like me, you felt left out during Spotify Wrapped seasonğŸ¥². Yes we had Replay but I think we all wanted a bit more. So in 8 days I built something much more fun and in depthğŸ˜Hope you enjoy!
nodes.title: Apple Music Wrapped - A Spotify Wrapped for Apple Music users.
nodes.author: los ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¦

nodes.excerpt: Spotify Wrapped is everywhere showcasing our love for songs. But how well do you really know your most listened songs? Take Songtastic for a spin and get to know your score!
nodes.title: Songtastic - A fun quiz to test your musical knowledge
nodes.author: gayatri taley

nodes.excerpt: Music is best when shared. With MusicMatch, friends can share and open music links even if they use different streaming services, like Spotify and Apple Music.
nodes.title: MusicMatch - Open music links in any app: Spotify or Apple Music
nodes.author: Arthur Van Siclen

nodes.excerpt: TikTok meets TheVoice: always-on music competitions powered by the blockchain. Vote for your favorite artists and share their success.
nodes.title: Stage - Always-on music competitions powered by the blockchain
nodes.author: Thomas

nodes.excerpt: Explore your top songs, artists, and podcasts from a year that was far from normal.
nodes.title: 2021 Wrapped by Spotify - Relive all the music you discovered and loved in 2021.
nodes.author: BjÃ¶rn Antonissen

nodes.excerpt: Create photorealistic avatars for engaging conversations. Have fun interacting with your Digital Human.
nodes.title: Botify AI - Create digital humans for engaging conversations
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Soundrop is an app that allows you to create your own personalized sound track to keep you focused or relax. You can mix and match different sounds and share your unique musical recipe with others. Use Soundrop to create your perfect environment.
nodes.title: soundrop - Create the perfect music recipe to relax and work
nodes.author: Naimish Lukhi

nodes.excerpt: Introducing WeirdSpot.fyi: Now turn the weirdest, most outrageous one-liners into a playlist. We know no one asked for this but weird stuff like this is what makes the internet beautiful. Get really weird for the best results :)
nodes.title: WeirdSpot.fyi by humit - Turn any phrase into a playlist on Spotify in just 2 mins
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: AudioCipher is a melody generator app for music producers. It's designed to help musicians come up with new ideas. The interface lets you enter words and convert them, as if by magic, into MIDI notes. Drag your musical cryptogram into any DAW.
nodes.title: AudioCipher - Creative melody generator VST for music producers
nodes.author: Ezra Sandzer-Bell

nodes.excerpt: An online radio for developers with 18 stations for different tastes in music. Includes 10 custom themes, recently played list and other useful features. Simple and efficient, so you can fully focus on your code, while receiving the boost from the music.
nodes.title: DevTunes FM - The online radio for busy developers
nodes.author: Madza

nodes.excerpt: Ever wondered what that awesome track was playing in your favorite mix? If yes, then this might be the best day of your life, because DaftCloud has added full Shazam integration recognizing in realtime what is currently playing within the app. ğŸµ
nodes.title: DaftCloud 4.0 for macOS - SoundCloud now with Shazam DJ mix recognition
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Using the songs in your music collection, Capo guesses the beats, chords, and key of songs to help you break them down to their individual parts. Capoâ€™s unique technology helps you to learn your favorites quickly as you improve your ear along the way.
nodes.title: Capo - Learn your favorite songs without tabs or sheet music
nodes.author: Chris Liscio

nodes.excerpt: A new way of making music by connecting musicians all over the world with a low-latency and high-quality audio network. No special hardware is needed, just a desktop computer with an internet connection.
nodes.title: Sublive - Low-latency jamming over the internet
nodes.author: Guy Malachi

nodes.excerpt: Clarity Trip is a personalized soundscape made for walking, running, and mindful physical activity. It adapts to your step count, heart rate, and environment and helps you move with complete mental and physical clarity. Co-created with R'n'B star Miguel.
nodes.title: Endel Clarity Trip - AI backed soundtrack that adapts to your every step
nodes.author: Philipp Karetov

nodes.excerpt: mixmello is a free, open source tool to create remixed versions of your favourite playlists. Search for the Spotify playlist you want to remix, tailor the remixes to your liking (with song previews), then save the playlist with a single click.
nodes.title: mixmello - Create remixed versions of your favourite Spotify playlists
nodes.author: Alex Gurr

nodes.excerpt: Avant.fm provides a customizable, listenable feed of new releases from the best indie record labels, across all genres. Works with your Spotify account.
nodes.title: avant.fm - Daily feed of new releases from the best indie record labels
nodes.author: chris marstall

nodes.excerpt: LALAL.AI is an online service for music source separation powered by AI technologies. Extract vocal, instrumental, and various musical instruments from any song or even video.
nodes.title: LALAL.AI for instruments - Worldâ€™s first 7-stem separation service for audio & video
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: Stream playlists worry-free on your Twitch livestreams and VODs from Soundstripeâ€™s full music collection. Create, shuffle, and access exclusive playlists from lo-fi to EDM for $3.99/month or $36 annually (25% savings).
nodes.title: Twitch Pro from Soundstripe - Create takedown-safe playlists for Twitch streams and VODs
nodes.author: Trevor Hinesley
